issue.description: Unresolved SCHEMA name in attribute qualification in call or return from predefined function USEDIN. Argument 2 in USEDIN call Attribute qualification: DOCUMENT_DEFINITION_MIM.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS
RULE Document_definition_mim.restrict_document_definition_category prevents harmonization with PDM schema v1.2 Additional Notes: Propose remove rule.

description.p: Document_definition should not be abstract. In some cases one does not know whether a document is physical or digital.
Remove the abstract constraint or introduce an instantiable subtype that may be digital or physical.

comment.description: The PLCS team accepts the comment and passes it over the PDM module team for resolution.

description.p: As Document_definition is not a subtype of product_view_definition (as part, slot & other product definitions are), is it important that no lifecycle information (normally through view_definition_context entity) can be assoicated?
Make Document_definition a subtype of product_view_definition?
